item.title: Partial mainstream NFT surge, Moonbirds 24-hour increase by 38.9%
item.description: On July 27th, according to data from Magic Eden, some mainstream NFTs witnessed an increase. These include:The Ethereum NFT Market:Moonbirds with a 24-hour change of +38.9%, and the floor price currently at 2.33 ETH, and a 24-hour volume of 567.8 ETH;Bored Ape Yacht Club with a 24-hour change of +3.6%, and the floor price currently at 12.8 ETH, and a 24-hour volume of 383 ETH;Pudgy Penguins with a 24-hour change of +2.2%, and the floor price currently at 16.2 ETH, and a 24-hour volume of 352.4 ETH;Lil Pudgys with a 24-hour change of +5.4%, and the floor price currently at 1.8 ETH, and a 24-hour volume of 173 ETH;Rektguy with a 24-hour change of +28.4%, and the floor price currently at 1.297 ETH, and a 24-hour volume of 153.5 ETH.The Solana NFT Market:Portals with a 24-hour change of +2.5%, and the floor price currently at 2.11 SOL, and a 24-hour volume of 510 SOL;Mad Lads with a 24-hour change of +1.2%, and the floor price currently at 34.72 SOL, and a 24-hour volume of 179

item.title: Binance Alpha will conduct a token airdrop today at 15:00 UTC, with a minimum threshold of 200 points.
item.description: July 27th. Binance Alpha is set to conduct a token airdrop at 15:00 (UTC+8) today. Users who hold at least 200 Alpha points can claim the tokens on a first-come, first-served basis until the airdrop pool is completely distributed or the airdrop event comes to an end. The specific token has not been made public yet.

item.title: Approximately $26.4 billion worth of ETH is currently queued to exit the Ethereum PoS network, signaling a decreasing trend in new staking demand
item.description: July 27th. As per the Validator Queue tracking website "validatorqueue", the present Ethereum PoS network exit queue has surged to 694,000 ETH, with a recent apex of 744,000 ETH. On July 16th, this figure was merely 1,920 ETH, and on July 15th, there was no requirement to queue for exit. Calculated at the current price, roughly $26.4 billion worth of ETH is exiting the PoS network, and the withdrawal delay has elongated to 12 days and 1 hour.Simultaneously, the staking demand for newly activated validators has reached a turning point following a recent period of growth. On July 17th, there were 435,000 ETH queuing to enter the network, but as of today, the admission queue has dropped to 220,000 ETH, amounting to approximately $8.36 billion. The current admission queue has a waiting time of 3 days and 20 hours.Andy Cronk, the Co-Founder of the staking service provider Figment, previously declared: "During price hikes, people unstake and sell to secure profits. Both retail and instit

item.title: LD Capital Founder Jack Yi: The market has completely entered a long-term bull, and may bid farewell to the traditional 4-year cycle pattern
item.description: On July 27th, Jack Yi, the founder of LD Capital, posted, expressing that the market has completely entered a long bull market and may bid farewell to the traditional 4-year cycle pattern. Stablecoins and blockchain present the best opportunity for the globalization of the US dollar. Coin and equity investments combined with stablecoin interest will continue to attract new users and funds to the market. The recent hottest trend is the coin and equity model, which is indeed an innovative invention. Compared to the US stock market, the cryptocurrency market is relatively small. With the success of BTC and ETH, mainstream coins such as SUI, BNB, SOL, TON, LTC, etc. will take advantage of this opportunity to rise even further. Following them will be smaller market cap altcoins.

item.title: Binance will adjust the Unified Account partial asset collateralization ratio
item.description: Update, on July 27th. According to an official announcement, Binance will make adjustments to the WBETH, TRUMP, LDO, C, SPK, PARTI unified account collateralization ratio at 14:00 (UTC+8) on July 29, 2025. And it will adjust the NEO, IOTX, MANA, KSM, SNX, DYDX unified account collateralization ratio at 14:00 (UTC+8) on August 1, 2025. This update is anticipated to be completed in approximately 30 minutes.

item.title: China Proposes Establishment of World Artificial Intelligence Cooperation Organization, with Preliminary Consideration of Headquarters in Shanghai
item.description: On July 27th, according to People's Daily, on the 26th, the Chinese government put forward the establishment of the World Artificial Intelligence Cooperation Organization, with an initial consideration that its headquarters would be located in Shanghai. This is an important initiative for China to adhere to multilateralism and promote global governance through consultation, joint contribution, and shared benefits. It is also a practical action for China to respond to the call of the global South, help bridge the digital and intelligent divide, and promote the ethical and inclusive development of artificial intelligence. China anticipates that the World Artificial Intelligence Cooperation Organization will become an important international public good and gradually form a widely accepted global governance framework and standard norms for artificial intelligence, ensuring that artificial intelligence continues to develop in the direction of human civilization progress. item.title: Next week will see a dense release of macroeconomic data, and the market still expects the Federal Reserve to once again stand pat.
item.description: On July 27th: Against the complex backdrop of escalating political pressure, the continuous evolution of trade policies, and conflicting economic signals, Federal Reserve Chairman Powell and his colleagues will enter the interest rate decision meeting in the coming week. This decision coincides with a rare data-intensive week - the U.S. government will consecutively release GDP, jobs reports, and the Fed's core inflation indicator. While the market generally anticipates that the Fed will once again maintain stability, this series of data may reshape the policy path. Economists predict that the U.S. second-quarter GDP annualized growth rate, which will be released on Wednesday of next week, is expected to reach 2.4% (a significant improvement compared to the 0.5% contraction in the first quarter), but this is mainly due to a substantial narrowing of the trade deficit. The July non-farm payroll report, which will be released on Friday, is expected to confirm a cautious trend in business

item.title: Ethereum Breaks $3800, Up 1.53% in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 27th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum has gone beyond $3800, and its 24-hour growth rate is 1.53%.

item.title: NAVX Surges Above $0.06, Up Over 33% in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 27th, based on market data, the token NAVX of the DeFi project NAVI Protocol on the Sui chain has broken through $0.06, experiencing a more than 33% increase in the past 24 hours.NAVI Protocol recently launched a multi-wallet management system called NAVI Copilot and became the debut partner of OKX's xBTC. According to Defilama data, NAVI's BTC assets currently account for 60% of the total Sui ecosystem.

item.title: MistTrack: Beware of Malicious Google Ads Phishing Scam Attack
item.description: July 27th â€” SlowMist MistTrack issued a phishing security alert. Reports have been received indicating that scammers are placing malicious Google ads (such as misttrack[.]tools) in an attempt to deceive users into signing harmful transactions. Users are advised to remain vigilant, not to trust unofficial links, and to utilize anti-phishing tools to ensure their protection.
